about_the_game:
Upon waking up alive in a familiar but different world, Timber wanders around the places where her father took her for walks. Recognizing that her creator is missing, the little doll searches for him with eagerness and longing, realizing that the closer she is to her destination, the emptier her journey becomes. After all, these are memories, right? The good, the bad, and the incomplete.
When playing as the Timber doll, the player must become familiar with controlling her opponents and utilizing her jumping skills to cross the hostile environments that surround her, all while searching for her father. Players must use logic, skill and resilience to cross the curtains of oblivion and see the carpenter again.

Hands of Timber is a 3D platformer with a narrative focus.

Key Points

  • A touching narrative - Hands of Timber delicately portrays, through an interactive narrative, the relationship between the doll and the carpenter, allowing the player to peek into the unique difficulties of the life of a black gay man during the 1920s - 1950, and what remains of his memories as he enters old age and his mind begins to fade.
  • Puzzle-Based environment - explore and interact with the world, solving puzzles to advance on your journey.
  • Control your enemies - using ropes, manipulate your enemies to get through the challenges.
  • A surreal world - travel through mysterious locations, which become increasingly empty, and enter a sensorial experience through unique shaders and visuals.
  • Original Soundtrack - enjoy the original soundtrack, made specifically to enhance the gameplay experience.

name: Hands of Timber

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Hands of Timber portrays the journey of a little wooden doll that wakes up inside the mind of its creator. To find her father, she must wander through his memories... the good, the bad, and the incomplete ones...
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
